register.information_is_empty: To complete the registration, you need to enter your name and date of birth.

weight.weight_empty: To continue, you need to enter your weight.

onboard.onboarding_1: Welcome to BodyMetrics! This app is designed to calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) and help you track your weight and BMI values. ‚öñÔ∏è
onboard.onboarding_2: We don't store your data, so there's no need to worry about privacy. üõ°Ô∏è
onboard.onboarding_3: You can create separate profiles for your family members and track their BMI as well. If you prefer, you can skip these steps and jump straight into calculating your BMI. üìä
onboard.onboarding_4: You can export your results to back up your data, and if you wish, you can restore it later. üíæ
